sentences.sContent: She was wearing the perfume that he’d bought her.
sentences.sCn: 她擦了他买给她的香水。

remMethod.val: per(完全)+fum(烟)+e→像烟雾一样从头到脚都有味道→香味

words.tran: 香料商；香料制造人；喷过香水的人
香水；香水商店；香水的制造
使充满香气；使形成气氛（perfume的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 香味， 芳香；香水； 香料
trans.tranOther: a liquid with a strong pleasant smell that women put on their skin or clothing to make themselves smell nice

trans.tranCn: 使散发香气； 洒香水于
trans.tranOther: to make a place have a sweet pleasant smell
